pipeline_promotors.py - Defining promotor characteristics¶

Author:Andreas Heger
Release:$Id$
Date:April 02, 2014
Tags:Python

Pipeline to annotate promotors according to certain properties:

  1. TATA box
  2. G+C Island

Overview¶

Usage¶

See Setting up a pipeline and Running a pipeline on general information how to use CGAT pipelines.

Configuration¶

The pipeline requires a configured pipeline.ini file.

The sphinxreport report requires a conf.py and sphinxreport.ini file (see Building pipeline reports). To start with, use the files supplied with the Example data.

Input¶

Optional inputs¶

Requirements¶

The pipeline requires the results from Annotation pipeline. Set the configuration variable annotations_database and annotations_dir.

On top of the default CGAT setup, the pipeline requires the following software to be in the path:

Program Version Purpose
     

Pipeline output¶

The major output is in the database file csvdb.

Example¶

Example data is available at http://www.cgat.org/~andreas/sample_data/pipeline_template.tgz. To run the example, simply unpack and untar:

wget http://www.cgat.org/~andreas/sample_data/pipeline_template.tgz
tar -xvzf pipeline_template.tgz
cd pipeline_template
python <srcdir>/pipeline_template.py make full

Note

For the pipeline to run, install the Annotation pipeline as well.

Glossary¶

Code¶

pipeline_promotors.connect()¶

connect to database.

Use this method to connect to additional databases.

Returns a database connection.

pipeline_promotors.findTATABox(infiles, outfile)¶

find TATA box in promotors. There are several matrices to choose from:

M00216 V$TATA_C Retroviral TATA box M00252 V$TATA_01 cellular and viral TATA box elements M00311 V$ATATA_B Avian C-type TATA box M00320 V$MTATA_B Muscle TATA box

pipeline_promotors.loadTATABox(infile, outfile)¶

load TATA box information.

pipeline_promotors.collectCpGIslands(infile, outfile)¶

select repeats from UCSC and write to outfile in gff format.

pipeline_promotors.annotateCpGIslands(infiles, outfile)¶

annotate transcript by absence/presence of CpG islands

pipeline_promotors.loadCpGIslands(infile, outfile)¶

load CpG Islands information.

pipeline_promotors.loadTranscriptSummary(infile, outfile)¶

summarize binding information per transcript.

pipeline_promotors.loadGeneSummary(infile, outfile)¶

summarize binding information per gene.

pipeline_promotors.buildGeneOntology(infile, outfile)¶

create an output file akin to GO ontology files to be used with GO.py

pipeline_promotors.build_report()¶

build report from scratch.

pipeline_promotors.update_report()¶

update report.

pipeline_promotors.publish_report()¶

publish report.
